products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout Ivory Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their sahara pvc blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. This hard-wearing cream pvc roller blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardent and waterproof. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows.
